turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you ever given to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I have given to the charity Save the Children

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Great, then you know how they use the money. Would you give some of your earnings today to them?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I give in other ways, so at this point I would rather give by another method

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Would you reconsider since the money goes to help children in all parts of the world?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: At this point I would not reconsider because I contribute in other methods

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm interested...what other ways do you contribute that has the lastly effect that Save the Children has?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am involved in various charities and like to give to them directly not through any other methods

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hummmm that's good that you give to them. Do you think you could, for the sake of argument be willing to give just a small potion of your earnings today to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Why is it that for the sake of argument I need to give to them today? I would rather give to them directly because I want to know that my contribution is going where I want it to go

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree and you said you have given to them in the past. Is there a reason specifically that you don't want to given to them again besides the fact that you do give to others and you do want to do it directly?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: There have been to many instances of scams and charities that don't get their donations.  So I rather give to them directly than through any other method

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: So is it that you don't trust this requestor to actually get your donation to STC?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No its not trust about the requestor but I rather have more control over my money than to use electronic versions

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I like that control also. I can't make any assurances to you that would change your mind. I do ask again that you reconsider since you know it is a good charity.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am sorry but at this point I would rather contribute to them directly.  I love charities that help children and neglected women.  But at this time I would rather contribute to them directly.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you know that the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I didn't know about any research team collecting donations but I still rather handle my contributions directly.  I hope that the research team get a lot of contributions but I will not be contributing through this system.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: So I'll ask one last time before returning this hit. How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am sorry about not donating through this system, and I am hopeful the research team get contributions but at this time I will be contributing to Save the Children directly.
